name: phishbert
description: a Slack bot to intercept and moderate phishing attempts in cryptocurrency or ICO channels

TOKEN.description: Slack API token generated and copied from https://api.slack.com/custom-integrations/legacy-tokens

PATTERN.description: Regex pattern for detecting phishing attempts (defaults to ETH addresses and EtherScan.io URLs, leave as-is if you don't know what this means)

WARN_USER.description: Should the bot direct message users warning them when they post a message containing a potential phishing attempt?

WARNING.description: The direct message content to send users when warning them about their message being deleted (if WARN_USER is set to true)
WARNING.value: :warning: It looks like you tried to post an Ethereum address or Etherscan link that could be used for phishing/stealing funds! This message has been removed. Please avoid posting such messages in the future, otherwise you may be banned. :warning:
